title: L.A. County to open 500 more voting centers for midterm election
dc:creator: Salvador Hernandez
description: L.A. County officials say 640 polling sites will be available by this weekend for voter registration, in-person voting and dropping off ballots.
content:encoded: L.A. County officials say 640 polling sites will be available by this weekend for voter registration, in-person voting and dropping off ballots.

media:content.media:description: LOS ANGELES, CA - SEPTEMBER 14: Stickers to students, staff and nearby residents after they cast their ballots at UCLA Ackerman Union as polls were open Tuesday for Californians to decide whether Gov. Gavin Newsom should be removed from office and, if so, who should replace him in a recall election. UCLA on Tuesday, Sept. 14, 2021 in Los Angeles, CA. (Al Seib / Los Angeles Times).
